1.0.0.name: wordpress/jirnee
1.0.0.description: Help your visitor promote your travel site! The Jirnee- Travel Share bookmarking Widget allows any visitor to bookmark your travel site easily with Facebook as the current service (with the goal to add more services shortly). Sign up for a Jirnee.com account to see how your visitors are sharing your travel content, which destination is shared the most, and more. It's all free--even the pretty charts and graphs.
